news.title: Gregg Wallace faces backlash over autism defence for misconduct claims
news.summary: The TV presenter was criticised after he appeared to link claims of misconduct to his autism diagnosis.

news.title: Children queuing for supplements killed in Israeli strike in Gaza, hospital says
news.summary: Eight children were among 15 people reportedly killed while queuing outside a clinic in the central town of Deir al-Balah.

news.title: Woman and three teens arrested over M&S and Co-op cyber-attacks
news.summary: Three men and one woman - aged between 17 and 20 - have been arrested in London and the Midlands.

news.title: Russia's intensifying drone war is spreading fear and eroding Ukrainian morale
news.summary: Ukraine is in danger of being overwhelmed by deadly strikes as Russia sends in swarms of drones.

news.title: Original Birkin bag shatters record with Â£7m sale
news.summary: The prototype of the most famous bag in fashion, made for Jane Birkin in 1985, smashes auction records.

news.title: Ukrainian intelligence officer shot dead in Kyiv
news.summary: The senior agent was shot in a car park in broad daylight on Thursday morning, CCTV shows.

news.title: School suspensions rise to nearly a million in England
news.summary: Suspensions and exclusions rose in the last school year - with a significant increase among primary-age pupils.

news.title: UK faces rising and unpredictable threat from Iran, report warns
news.summary: A wide-ranging report by an intelligence committee has set out the risks Iran poses to the UK.

news.title: It's too easy to claim benefits in UK, Badenoch says
news.summary: Conservative leader tells the BBC there needs to be a "crack down on people exploiting the system".

news.title: Police declare major incident over Belfast bonfire site after power supply fears
news.summary: Police say the risk of the bonfire going ahead as planned is lower than carrying out the proposals to dismantle it.
